item.title: Russians on the Netherlands and the Dutch
item.description: Dasha and Tamara Dutch people are known for being direct, a sentiment often echoed by Tamara Zhirova, who would know, as she lives in Amsterdam. (Where she also teaches Russian. You can find her on YouTube.) An entertaining conversation, mainly thanks to Tamara, who also sings for us.

item.title: Dead or Reviving: Russian Villages
item.description: Presented in order of release. Lost A somber depiction of the потерянное богатство страны, the lost wealth of the nation. ‘How Russia is dying.’ Subtitles available in settings. Как погибает Россия. Разруха, воровство и смерть в русской деревне (Varlamov, 16-04-2020, 48 m)

item.title: Cold, Colder, Coldest: Oymyakon
item.description: There are only (or despite that, still) about 500 souls living there; more of a village than a city. But ‘World’s coldest village or Coldest city in the world – it is очень холодно (very cold) there. Read/watch and shiver.
